Generated Narrative: ImplementationGuide smart.who.int.dak-ccc

Profile: SMARTImplementationGuide

DakCcc

The official URL for this implementation guide is: 

http://smart.who.int/dak-ccc/ImplementationGuide/smart.who.int.dak-ccc

CCC DAK

extension.valueMarkdown: Automatically added as a dependency - all IGs depend on HL7 Terminology
Automatically added as a dependency - all IGs depend on the HL7 Extension Pack

resource.name: Ability to work offline and in low-bandwidth areas
resource.description:
*Category*: System requirements – hardware and connectivity
Ability to work offline and in low-bandwidth areas

resource.name: Accept data from multiple input methods including paper and geocoding (global positioning system)
resource.description:
*Category*: System requirements – interoperability
Accept data from multiple input methods including paper and geocoding (global positioning system)

resource.name: Add data that provide socio-demographic information about the client
resource.description: *Business process* (A) Registration: As a Health worker or clerk, I want to: >Add data that provide socio-demographic information about the client so that >I can use the data to for analysis, forecasting and planning

resource.name: Adhere to complex password requirements
resource.description:
*Category*: Security – authentication
Adhere to complex password requirements

resource.name: Adjust display to fit small screens (such as mobile phones)
resource.description:
*Category*: System requirements – usability
Adjust display to fit small screens (such as mobile phones)

resource.name: Alert the user when navigating away from the form without saving
resource.description:
*Category*: System requirements – usability
Alert the user when navigating away from the form without saving

resource.name: All Users
resource.description: Actor All Users from Function Requirements

resource.name: Allow admin user to request password reset
resource.description:
*Category*: Security – user management
Allow admin user to request password reset

resource.name: Allow cascading user management and assignment of roles
resource.description:
*Category*: Security – user management
Allow cascading user management and assignment of roles

resource.name: Allow each user to be assigned to one or more roles
resource.description:
*Category*: Security – user management
Allow each user to be assigned to one or more roles

resource.name: Allow edits to fields on screen before information is committed
resource.description: *Business process* (A) Registration: As a Health worker or clerk, I want to: >Allow edits to fields on screen before information is committed so that >I can ensure information has been checked before submission

resource.name: Allow edits to fields on screen before information is committed
resource.description: *Business process* (A) Registration: As a Health worker or clerk, I want to: >Allow edits to fields on screen before information is committed so that >I can ensure information has been checked before submission

resource.name: Allow for a temporary identification in emergency situations when full identity is unknown
resource.description: *Business process* (A) Registration: As a Health worker or clerk, I want to: >Allow for a temporary identification in emergency situations when full identity is unknown so that >I can proceed with registration

resource.name: Allow for a temporary identification in emergency situations when full identity is unknown
resource.description: *Business process* (A) Registration: As a Health worker or clerk, I want to: >Allow for a temporary identification in emergency situations when full identity is unknown so that >I can proceed with registration

resource.name: Allow for data exchange and efficient synchronization across multiple facilities and points of service when the Internet is available, even when it is intermittent and slow
resource.description:
*Category*: System requirements – hardware and connectivity
Allow for data exchange and efficient synchronization across multiple facilities and points of service when the Internet is available, even when it is intermittent and slow

resource.name: Allow for offline and online functionality
resource.description:
*Category*: System requirements – general
Allow for offline and online functionality

resource.name: Allow roles to be associated with specific geographical areas and/or health facilities (with the ability to choose which facility to log into as the user may work across several facilities)
resource.description:
*Category*: Security – user management
Allow roles to be associated with specific geographical areas and/or health facilities (with the ability to choose which facility to log into as the user may work across several facilities)

resource.name: Allow the recording of key observations during a visit and a space to make general notes about the consultation and treatment provided
resource.description: *Business process* (C) Treat the child: As a Health worker, I want to: >Allow the recording of key observations during a visit and a space to make general notes about the consultation and treatment provided so that >I can ensure that the client's health information is recorded and kept up to date

resource.name: Allow the recording of key observations during the follow-up visit
resource.description: *Business process* (C) Treat the child: As a Health worker, I want to: >Allow the recording of key observations during the follow-up visit so that >I can ensure the client's health information is recorded and kept up to date

resource.name: Allow user to change the user's own password
resource.description:
*Category*: Security – user management
Allow user to change the user's own password

resource.name: Allow user with permission to create a new user and temporary password
resource.description:
*Category*: Security – user management
Allow user with permission to create a new user and temporary password

resource.name: Allow users to enable and disable another user
resource.description:
*Category*: Security – user management
Allow users to enable and disable another user

resource.name: Anonymize data that are exported from the system when required (also ability to export non-anonymized data from the system)
resource.description:
*Category*: Security – confidentiality
Anonymize data that are exported from the system when required (also ability to export non-anonymized data from the system)

resource.name: Automated system notification
resource.description: Actor Automated system notification from Function Requirements

resource.name: Automatically log out the user after specified time of inactivity
resource.description:
*Category*: Security – confidentiality
Automatically log out the user after specified time of inactivity

resource.name: Be able to accommodate at least 3000 health facilities
resource.description:
*Category*: System requirements – scalability
Be able to accommodate at least 3000 health facilities

resource.name: Be able to accommodate at least 5000 concurrent users
resource.description:
*Category*: System requirements – scalability
Be able to accommodate at least 5000 concurrent users

resource.name: Be able to accommodate more than [x number of] concurrent users
resource.description:
*Category*: System requirements – scalability
Be able to accommodate more than [x number of] concurrent users

resource.name: Be able to build the type of solution suitable for my country/setting using the correct modules according to preferences
resource.description: *Business process* (G) Triage and Emergency Assessment: As a All Users, I want to: >Be able to build the type of solution suitable for my country/setting using the correct modules according to preferences so that >I can build the solution as closely as possible to the country/setting according to regulations within the country and according to our specific solution requirements

resource.name: Be able to differentiate between simple and complex care provision requirements
resource.description: *Business process* (G) Triage and Emergency Assessment: As a All Users, I want to: >Be able to differentiate between simple and complex care provision requirements so that >I can provide the correct level of detail for the user type (e.g. doctor/specialist vs nurse health workers)

resource.name: Be able to edit the identification information (including information pertaining to the client's caregiver)
resource.description: *Business process* (A) Registration: As a Health worker or clerk, I want to: >Be able to edit the identification information (including information pertaining to the client's caregiver) so that >I can update existing client information

resource.name: Be able to enter new identification information (including information pertaining to the client's caregiver)
resource.description: *Business process* (A) Registration: As a Health worker or clerk, I want to: >Be able to enter new identification information (including information pertaining to the client's caregiver) so that >I can enter new client information

resource.name: Be able to find out where a treatment method may be available nearby
resource.description: *Business process* (D) Referral: As a Health worker and neonate/infant/child (caregiver), I want to: >Be able to find out where a treatment method may be available nearby  so that >I can refer my client to another facility to receive the appropriate services

resource.name: Be able to gather the client's caregiver basic information (if required)
resource.description: *Business process* (A) Registration: As a Health worker or clerk, I want to: >Be able to gather the client's caregiver basic information (if required) so that >I can track and follow the name of the client's caregiver for the purposes of engagement during the consultation

resource.name: Be able to gather unique identifier number/information pertaining to the client that does not include personal information
resource.description: *Business process* (A) Registration: As a Health worker or clerk, I want to: >Be able to gather unique identifier number/information pertaining to the client that does not include personal information so that >I do not have to manage personal information management regulations/laws

resource.name: Be able to gather unique identifier number/information pertaining to the client that includes personal information
resource.description: *Business process* (A) Registration: As a Health worker or clerk, I want to: >Be able to gather unique identifier number/information pertaining to the client that includes personal information so that >I can identify the client using personal information within personal information management regulations/laws

resource.name: Be able to input biometric information only (e.g. age, sex, respiration, weight, birthweight, height)
resource.description: *Business process* (A) Registration: As a Health worker or clerk, I want to: >Be able to input biometric information only (e.g. age, sex, respiration, weight, birthweight, height) so that >I can proceed without using personal information but still maintain medical information via a unique identifier number (also useful in emergency scenarios)

resource.name: Be able to know the care my client received at the referral facility
resource.description: *Business process* (D) Referral: As a Health worker, I want to: >Be able to know the care my client received at the referral facility  so that >I can provide appropriate care if my client comes back to my facility

resource.name: Be able to provide feedback to the facility administrator/IT administrator for issues users notice through daily use of the tool and recommended solution improvements.
resource.description: *Business process* (G) Triage and Emergency Assessment: As a All Users, I want to: >Be able to provide feedback to the facility administrator/IT administrator for issues users notice through daily use of the tool and recommended solution improvements. so that >Future solution development can be improved for the users

resource.name: Be able to run calculations on data to populate indicators or reports on my own performance and service delivery – calculations on data should be conducted with Fast Health Interoperability Resources (FHIR) and contextual query language
resource.description: *Business process* (F) Aggregate Reporting: As a Facility staff, facility staff in charge, district health officer/staff, I want to: >Be able to run calculations on data to populate indicators or reports on my own performance and service delivery – calculations on data should be conducted with Fast Health Interoperability Resources (FHIR) and contextual query language so that >I can understand trends and challenges and track my own performance over time

resource.name: Be able to share my client’s health records with the follow-up facility
resource.description: *Business process* (E) Follow-up: As a Facility health worker, I want to: >Be able to share my client’s health records with the follow-up facility  so that >They can provide the care my client needs

resource.name: Be able to share my client’s health records with the referral facility
resource.description: *Business process* (D) Referral: As a Health worker, I want to: >Be able to share my client’s health records with the referral facility  so that >They can provide the health care my client needs

resource.name: Be able to show improvements or decline of a client's health based on previous/current consultations including before and after treatment
resource.description: *Business process* (C) Treat the child: As a Health worker and neonate/infant/child (caregiver), I want to: >Be able to show improvements or decline of a client's health based on previous/current consultations including before and after treatment so that >I can provide appropriate services according to the latest clinical protocols

resource.name: Be able to start a new Business Process B: Assess and classify the sick child if new symptoms have been identified with the client
resource.description: *Business process* (C) Treat the child: As a Health worker, I want to: >Be able to start a new Business Process B: Assess and classify the sick child if new symptoms have been identified with the client so that >I can provide appropriate services according to the latest clinical protocols

resource.name: Be able to track treatments via reference numbers so that these can be updated as required and can be used to create "treatment modules" pertinent to a country or emergency setting
resource.description: *Business process* (G) Triage and Emergency Assessment: As a All Users, I want to: >Be able to track treatments via reference numbers so that these can be updated as required and can be used to create \"treatment modules\" pertinent to a country or emergency setting so that >Countries can implement the correct treatment module for their regulations and emergency setting

resource.name: Be able to view data on my own performance and service delivery
resource.description: *Business process* (F) Aggregate Reporting: As a Facility staff, facility staff in charge, district health officer/staff, I want to: >Be able to view data on my own performance and service delivery   so that >I can understand trends and challenges and track my own performance over time

resource.name: Be able to view the age of the client on the client record or after consultation with the caregiver to add the client's age to the record
resource.description: *Business process* (B) Assess and Classify the Sick Child: As a Health worker, I want to: >Be able to view the age of the client on the client record or after consultation with the caregiver to add the client's age to the record so that >I can provide appropriate services for the client's problems based on their age

resource.name: Be designed to be flexible enough to accommodate for the necessary changes in the future
resource.description:
*Category*: System requirements – general
Be designed to be flexible enough to accommodate for the necessary changes in the future

resource.name: Be interoperable with external systems through mediators
resource.description:
*Category*: System requirements – interoperability
Be interoperable with external systems through mediators

resource.name: Be reliable and robust (minimize the number of system crashes)
resource.description:
*Category*: System requirements – usability
Be reliable and robust (minimize the number of system crashes)

resource.name: Be user-friendly for people with low computer literacy
resource.description:
*Category*: System requirements – usability
Be user-friendly for people with low computer literacy

resource.name: Bypass the standard flow at any point if an urgent case is identified – Refer to Business Process G. Triage and assessment
resource.description: *Business process* (A) Registration: As a Health worker or clerk, I want to: >Bypass the standard flow at any point if an urgent case is identified – Refer to Business Process G. Triage and assessment so that >The child/infant can receive immediate attention – Refer to Business Process G. Triage and assessment

resource.name: Communicate with external systems through mediators
resource.description:
*Category*: System requirements – interoperability
Communicate with external systems through mediators

resource.name: Community health worker
resource.description: Actor Community health worker from Function Requirements

resource.name: Configure business rules in line with guidelines and standard operating procedures (using the decision logic and contextual query language [CQL] + Fast Health Interoperability Resources [FHIR])
resource.description:
*Category*: System requirements – configuration
Configure business rules in line with guidelines and standard operating procedures (using the decision logic and contextual query language [CQL] + Fast Health Interoperability Resources [FHIR])

resource.name: Configure error messages
resource.description:
*Category*: System requirements – configuration
Configure error messages

resource.name: Configure the system centrally
resource.description:
*Category*: System requirements – configuration
Configure the system centrally

resource.name: Configure workflows and business rules to accommodate differences between facilities
resource.description:
*Category*: System requirements – configuration
Configure workflows and business rules to accommodate differences between facilities

resource.name: Create a new follow-up request to the health facility
resource.description: *Business process* (C) Treat the child: As a Health worker, I want to: >Create a new follow-up request to the health facility so that >I can refer my client so that they receive the appropriate services

resource.name: Create a new follow-up request to the health facility
resource.description: *Business process* (C) Treat the child: As a Health worker, I want to: >Create a new follow-up request to the health facility so that >I can refer my client so that they receive the appropriate services

resource.name: Create a new referral request to the health facility
resource.description: *Business process* (C) Treat the child: As a Health worker, I want to: >Create a new referral request to the health facility so that >I can refer my client so that they receive the appropriate services

resource.name: Create a new referral request to the health facility
resource.description: *Business process* (C) Treat the child: As a Health worker, I want to: >Create a new referral request to the health facility so that >I can refer my client so that they receive the appropriate services

resource.name: Determine whether to manage client at the facility or refer
resource.description: *Business process* (B) Assess and Classify the Sick Child: As a Health worker, I want to: >Determine whether to manage client at the facility or refer so that >I can ensure the client receives appropriate services as quickly as possible

resource.name: Display a schedule of available days
resource.description: *Business process* (E) Follow-up: As a Facility health worker, I want to: >Display a schedule of available days so that >I can notify client when to return for subsequent contact

resource.name: Display a schedule of available days
resource.description: *Business process* (E) Follow-up: As a Facility health worker, I want to: >Display a schedule of available days so that >I can notify the client when to return for subsequent contact

resource.name: Display sufficient data to identify the client
resource.description: *Business process* (A) Registration: As a Health worker or clerk, I want to: >Display sufficient data to identify the client so that >I can confirm that it is the correct client

resource.name: Display the number of existing contacts per day (to allow for balancing)
resource.description: *Business process* (E) Follow-up: As a Facility health worker, I want to: >Display the number of existing contacts per day (to allow for balancing) so that >I can manage and follow up on clients requiring services

resource.name: Easy to learn and intuitive to enable user to navigate between pages
resource.description:
*Category*: System requirements – usability
Easy to learn and intuitive to enable user to navigate between pages

resource.name: Edit data that provide socio-demographic information about the client
resource.description: *Business process* (A) Registration: As a Health worker or clerk, I want to: >Edit data that provide socio-demographic information about the client so that >I can use the data to for analysis, forecasting and planning

resource.name: Enable deployment in an environment subject to power loss
resource.description:
*Category*: System requirements – general
Enable deployment in an environment subject to power loss

resource.name: Enable earlier versions of a record to be recoverable
resource.description:
*Category*: System requirements – general
Enable earlier versions of a record to be recoverable

resource.name: Enable use via a Web interface and mobile applications for use on various technology devices such as computers, laptops, tablets and mobiles
resource.description:
*Category*: System requirements – hardware and connectivity
Enable use via a Web interface and mobile applications for use on various technology devices such as computers, laptops, tablets and mobiles

resource.name: Exchange data with other approved systems
resource.description:
*Category*: System requirements – interoperability
Exchange data with other approved systems

resource.name: Facility health worker
resource.description: Actor Facility health worker from Function Requirements

resource.name: Facility staff, facility staff in charge, district health officer/staff
resource.description: Actor Facility staff, facility staff in charge, district health officer/staff from Function Requirements

resource.name: Find facilities that can provide the service or treatment method that mine cannot provide.
resource.description: *Business process* (D) Referral: As a Health worker and neonate/infant/child (caregiver), I want to: >Find facilities that can provide the service or treatment method that mine cannot provide.  so that >The client does not travel to a facility that cannot help them

resource.name: Functional Requirement Categories
resource.description: Value Set for Functional Requirements Categories. Autogenerated from DAK artifacts

resource.name: Functional Requirement Categories
resource.description: CodeSystem for Functional Requirements Categories.  Autogenerated from DAK artifacts

resource.name: Functional Requirements - Business Process
resource.description: ValueSet of Functional Requirements - Business Process

resource.name: Functional Requirements - Business Process
resource.description: ValueSet of Functional Requirements - Business Process

resource.name: Generate analysis of the usage of different system features and reports
resource.description:
*Category*: Security – audit trail and logs
Generate analysis of the usage of different system features and reports

resource.name: Generate IDs that are unique across different installations or sites
resource.description:
*Category*: System requirements – general
Generate IDs that are unique across different installations or sites

resource.name: Have ability to easily back up information
resource.description:
*Category*: System requirements – general
Have ability to easily back up information

resource.name: Health worker
resource.description: Actor Health worker from Function Requirements

resource.name: Health worker and neonate/infant/child (caregiver)
resource.description: Actor Health worker and neonate/infant/child (caregiver) from Function Requirements

resource.name: Health worker or clerk
resource.description: Actor Health worker or clerk from Function Requirements

resource.name: Highlight abnormal values
resource.description: *Business process* (B) Assess and Classify the Sick Child: As a Health worker, I want to: >Highlight abnormal values so that >I can identify critical health issues or errors (if a data entry issue)

resource.name: Highlight abnormal values
resource.description: *Business process* (B) Assess and Classify the Sick Child: As a Health worker, I want to: >Highlight abnormal values so that >I can identify critical health issues or errors (if a data entry issue)

resource.name: Identify in the client's record if this is a follow-up appointment or an initial visit
resource.description: *Business process* (A) Registration: As a Health worker or clerk, I want to: >Identify in the client's record if this is a follow-up appointment or an initial visit so that >I can identify which process to follow and view the client's previous problems that required a follow-up

resource.name: Identify key symptoms and signs that may require medical attention
resource.description: *Business process* (B) Assess and Classify the Sick Child: As a Health worker, I want to: >Identify key symptoms and signs that may require medical attention so that >I can provide the appropriate services as quickly as possible

resource.name: Identify the date of the last attended contact
resource.description: *Business process* (A) Registration: As a Health worker or clerk, I want to: >Identify the date of the last attended contact so that >I can ensure client is receiving services according to the recommended contact schedule

resource.name: Indicate (based on protocol) the preferred days for follow-up contact
resource.description: *Business process* (E) Follow-up: As a Facility health worker, I want to: >Indicate (based on protocol) the preferred days for follow-up contact so that >The client receives services according to the recommended contact schedule

resource.name: Indicate (based on the protocol) the preferred days for follow-up contact
resource.description: *Business process* (E) Follow-up: As a Facility health worker, I want to: >Indicate (based on the protocol) the preferred days for follow-up contact so that >The client receives services according to recommended contact schedule

resource.name: Indicate if the age of the child is not known and be able to provide information as to how an age determination has been agreed
resource.description: *Business process* (B) Assess and Classify the Sick Child: As a Health worker, I want to: >Indicate if the age of the child is not known and be able to provide information as to how an age determination has been agreed so that >I can provide appropriate services according to the latest clinical protocols

resource.name: Indicate mandatory fields that must be filled out for the registration to be valid
resource.description: *Business process* (A) Registration: As a Health worker or clerk, I want to: >Indicate mandatory fields that must be filled out for the registration to be valid so that >I can ensure all necessary information has been completed

resource.name: Indicate mandatory fields that must be filled out for the registration to be valid
resource.description: *Business process* (A) Registration: As a Health worker or clerk, I want to: >Indicate mandatory fields that must be filled out for the registration to be valid so that >I can ensure all necessary information has been completed

resource.name: Indicate that the patient has arrived for the initial visit, scheduled contact or specific complaint (tasks will vary based on health worker roles)
resource.description: *Business process* (B) Assess and Classify the Sick Child: As a Health worker, I want to: >Indicate that the patient has arrived for the initial visit, scheduled contact or specific complaint (tasks will vary based on health worker roles) so that >I can know what services to provide

resource.name: Link with insurance systems to verify eligibility and submit claims
resource.description:
*Category*: System requirements – interoperability
Link with insurance systems to verify eligibility and submit claims

resource.name: Lock a user out after a specified number of wrong password attempts
resource.description:
*Category*: Security – authentication
Lock a user out after a specified number of wrong password attempts

resource.name: Log access to data summaries, reports, analysis and visualization features
resource.description:
*Category*: Security – audit trail and logs
Log access to data summaries, reports, analysis and visualization features

resource.name: Log access to views of individual client records
resource.description:
*Category*: Security – audit trail and logs
Log access to views of individual client records

resource.name: Log all activities performed by the user, including date and time stamp
resource.description:
*Category*: Security – audit trail and logs
Log all activities performed by the user, including date and time stamp

resource.name: Log all data and system errors
resource.description:
*Category*: Security – audit trail and logs
Log all data and system errors

resource.name: Log exchange of data with other systems
resource.description:
*Category*: Security – audit trail and logs
Log exchange of data with other systems

resource.name: Log system log-ins and log-outs
resource.description:
*Category*: Security – audit trail and logs
Log system log-ins and log-outs

resource.name: Manage clinical algorithm guidance changes through a change management process with quality assurance (using a reference system) and be able to push the information out to all solutions in use
resource.description: *Business process* (G) Triage and Emergency Assessment: As a All Users, I want to: >Manage clinical algorithm guidance changes through a change management process with quality assurance (using a reference system) and be able to push the information out to all solutions in use so that >I can ensure that all guidance being followed in the field is using the latest approved guidance from WHO

resource.name: Must have the ability to store images or other unstructured data
resource.description:
*Category*: System requirements – general
Must have the ability to store images or other unstructured data

resource.name: Neonate/infant/child (caregiver)
resource.description: Actor Neonate/infant/child (caregiver) from Function Requirements

resource.name: Notify a user if their account is locked due to wrong password attempts
resource.description:
*Category*: Security – authentication
Notify a user if their account is locked due to wrong password attempts

resource.name: Notify the user of a password change to their account
resource.description:
*Category*: Security – authentication
Notify the user of a password change to their account

resource.name: Notify the user to change their password the first time they log in
resource.description:
*Category*: Security – authentication
Notify the user to change their password the first time they log in

resource.name: Notify the user to regularly change the user's password
resource.description:
*Category*: Security – user management
Notify the user to regularly change the user's password

resource.name: Notify/send a reminder to the client's caregiver for the referral appointment
resource.description: *Business process* (E) Follow-up: As a Automated system notification, I want to: >Notify/send a reminder to the client's caregiver for the referral appointment so that >So that the caregiver does not forget the appointment to receive the required health services

resource.name: Notify/send a reminder to the client's caregiver for the referral appointment
resource.description: *Business process* (D) Referral: As a Automated system notification, I want to: >Notify/send a reminder to the client's caregiver for the referral appointment so that >So that the caregiver does not forget the appointment to receive the required health services

resource.name: Prevent remembering username and password
resource.description:
*Category*: Security – confidentiality
Prevent remembering username and password

resource.name: Produce a range of prepared and ad hoc reports and analyses
resource.description: *Business process* (F) Aggregate Reporting: As a Facility staff, facility staff in charge, district health officer/staff, I want to: >Produce a range of prepared and ad hoc reports and analyses  so that >I am able to use data collected at the facility, including data for service delivery (beyond reporting purposes alone)

resource.name: Provide a list of emergency referral locations and contact details if local emergency number (e.g. 911/999) is not used
resource.description: *Business process* (D) Referral: As a Health worker, I want to: >Provide a list of emergency referral locations and contact details if local emergency number (e.g. 911/999) is not used so that >I can arrange emergency services

resource.name: Provide a list of follow-up location options and contact details
resource.description: *Business process* (E) Follow-up: As a Facility health worker, I want to: >Provide a list of follow-up location options and contact details so that >I can choose the best options for the client and schedule a follow-up

resource.name: Provide a list of referral location options, specialisms and contact details
resource.description: *Business process* (D) Referral: As a Health worker and neonate/infant/child (caregiver), I want to: >Provide a list of referral location options, specialisms and contact details so that >I can choose the best options for the client's contact facility and schedule a referral

resource.name: Provide a list of scheduled contacts and to allow for defaulters to be traced
resource.description: *Business process* (E) Follow-up: As a Community health worker, I want to: >Provide a list of scheduled contacts and to allow for defaulters to be traced so that >I can track and follow up clients requiring services

resource.name: Provide a list of scheduled contacts to allow for defaulters to be traced
resource.description: *Business process* (A) Registration: As a Health worker or clerk, I want to: >Provide a list of scheduled contacts to allow for defaulters to be traced so that >I can track and follow up clients requiring services

resource.name: Provide a list of tests that the health worker can order
resource.description: *Business process* (B) Assess and Classify the Sick Child: As a Health worker, I want to: >Provide a list of tests that the health worker can order so that >I can provide appropriate services according to the latest clinical protocols

resource.name: Provide a list of tests that the health worker can order for the client based on guidance for their age/symptoms/diagnosis
resource.description: *Business process* (B) Assess and Classify the Sick Child: As a Health worker, I want to: >Provide a list of tests that the health worker can order for the client based on guidance for their age/symptoms/diagnosis so that >I can provide appropriate services according to the latest clinical protocols

resource.name: Provide a list or roster of all clients in the schedule
resource.description: *Business process* (E) Follow-up: As a Community health worker, I want to: >Provide a list or roster of all clients in the schedule so that >I can manage and follow up on clients requiring services

resource.name: Provide a list or roster of all infant/child clients
resource.description: *Business process* (D) Referral: As a Health worker, I want to: >Provide a list or roster of all infant/child clients so that >I know which clients to follow up or are due for services

resource.name: Provide a list or roster of all infant/child clients due to arrive
resource.description: *Business process* (A) Registration: As a Health worker or clerk, I want to: >Provide a list or roster of all infant/child clients due to arrive so that >I know which clients to follow up or are due for services

resource.name: Provide a means to ensure confidentiality and privacy of personal health information
resource.description:
*Category*: Security – confidentiality
Provide a means to ensure confidentiality and privacy of personal health information

resource.name: Provide a mechanism to securely change a user's password
resource.description:
*Category*: Security – authentication
Provide a mechanism to securely change a user's password

resource.name:
Provide a modular approach to the solution to accommodate variations required to make the solution country-specific, for example: 
- ability to use/not to use personal identifiers for registration 
- include a focus on symptoms/diagnosis that may appear in a country-susceptible manner (malaria, HIV)
- treatment modules that may be available in the country/setting (e.g. oral only vs injections)
resource.description: *Business process* (G) Triage and Emergency Assessment: As a All Users, I want to: >Provide a modular approach to the solution to accommodate variations required to make the solution country-specific, for example: - ability to use/not to use personal identifiers for registration - include a focus on symptoms/diagnosis that may appear in a country-susceptible manner (malaria, HIV) - treatment modules that may be available in the country/setting (e.g. oral only vs injections) so that >The registration and consultation process includes what is more likely required without by-passing questions that are not required

resource.name: Provide a source to access accurate health information
resource.description: *Business process* (C) Treat the child: As a Health worker and neonate/infant/child (caregiver), I want to: >Provide a source to access accurate health information so that >I can manage my client's health in my daily life

resource.name: Provide sufficient data to rule out that this client is already in the system

resource.name: Provide the ability to "check in" for a scheduled contact
resource.description: *Business process* (A) Registration: As a Health worker or clerk, I want to: >Provide the ability to \"check in\" for a scheduled contact so that >I can initiate services at the follow-up contact

resource.description: *Business process* (A) Registration: As a Health worker or clerk, I want to: >Provide tools to search, sort and filter the infant/child client database so that >I can manage and follow up on clients requiring services

resource.name: Read client identification system (e.g. quick response [QR] code, barcode, fingerprint) and pull up client information
resource.description: *Business process* (A) Registration: As a Health worker or clerk, I want to: >Read client identification system (e.g. quick response [QR] code, barcode, fingerprint) and pull up client information so that >I can confirm that it is the correct client and update information as necessary

Record all authentication violations

resource.name: Record identification and tracking information (such as mobile phone number)
resource.description: *Business process* (E) Follow-up: As a Facility health worker, I want to: >Record identification and tracking information (such as mobile phone number) so that >I can follow up and remind the client on when to return for services

resource.name: Refer to Business Process A: Registration
resource.description: *Business process* (E) Follow-up: As a Community health worker, I want to: >Refer to Business Process A: Registration so that >I can identify the correct client details and health records

resource.description:
*Category*: System requirements – general
Report version number when saving data to the database

resource.description: *Business process* (A) Registration: As a Health worker or clerk, I want to: >Require a user to search if a client is already in the system before starting a new medical record entry so that >I can confirm that it is the correct client and update information as necessary

*Category*: Security – authentication
Reset a user's password in a secure manner

resource.name: Scalable to accommodate new demands

*Category*: System requirements – scalability
Scalable to accommodate new demands

resource.name: Search if the client is already in system (using at least two identifiers) (including information pertaining to the client's caregiver)
resource.description: *Business process* (A) Registration: As a Health worker or clerk, I want to: >Search if the client is already in system (using at least two identifiers) (including information pertaining to the client's caregiver) so that >I can check if this is a new or existing client

resource.description:
*Category*: System requirements – general
Show the number of records that are not yet synchronized

resource.description:
*Category*: System requirements – usability
Simplify data recording through predefined dropdown or searchable lists, radio buttons and check boxes

resource.name: Solution must be able to leverage the data dictionary (to be produced as part of workstream 2/3 work)
resource.description: *Business process* (G) Triage and Emergency Assessment: As a All Users, I want to: >Solution must be able to leverage the data dictionary (to be produced as part of workstream 2/3 work) so that >The tool is consistent

resource.name: Suggest appropriate treatments/investigations based on findings
resource.description: *Business process* (C) Treat the child: As a Health worker and neonate/infant/child (caregiver), I want to: >Suggest appropriate treatments/investigations based on findings so that >I can provide appropriate services according to the latest clinical protocols

resource.name: Suggest appropriate treatments/investigations based on findings including the ability to propose alternative treatments in the case that the primary treatment is not available
resource.description: *Business process* (C) Treat the child: As a Health worker and neonate/infant/child (caregiver), I want to: >Suggest appropriate treatments/investigations based on findings including the ability to propose alternative treatments in the case that the primary treatment is not available so that >I can provide appropriate services according to the latest clinical protocols

resource.name: Support definitions of unlimited roles and assigned levels of access, viewing, entry, editing and auditing
resource.description:
*Category*: Security – user management
Support definitions of unlimited roles and assigned levels of access, viewing, entry, editing and auditing

resource.name: Support multiple languages – English, French, Spanish, Chinese, Russian, Arabic
resource.description:
*Category*: System requirements – usability
Support multiple languages – English, French, Spanish, Chinese, Russian, Arabic

resource.name: Support real-time data entry validation and feedback to prevent data entry errors from being recorded
resource.description:
*Category*: System requirements – usability
Support real-time data entry validation and feedback to prevent data entry errors from being recorded

resource.name: The reference application must have an FHIR back end/FHIR native and leverage the workstream 3 content (CQL + FHIR resources)
resource.description:
*Category*: System requirements – interoperability
The reference application must have an FHIR back end/FHIR native and leverage the workstream 3 content (CQL + FHIR resources)

resource.name: The solution to represent data in an FHIR format that can be synced with client applications that use the FHIR international patient summary (IPS) on their mobile devices
resource.description: *Business process* (G) Triage and Emergency Assessment: As a All Users, I want to: >The solution to represent data in an FHIR format that can be synced with client applications that use the FHIR international patient summary (IPS) on their mobile devices so that >To ensure that clients are able to access their personal records and keep a copy on their phones using the Health Level 7 IPS format.

resource.name: The solution to store data in an FHIR-compliant server
resource.description: *Business process* (G) Triage and Emergency Assessment: As a All Users, I want to: >The solution to store data in an FHIR-compliant server so that >Consistency of data representation and ability to exchange data with other services and solutions using FHIR standards and common value sets (International Statistical Classification of Diseases and Related Health Problems, Logical Observation Identifiers, Names and Codes)

resource.name: The solution to support multi-media, such as video, photos and audio
resource.description: *Business process* (G) Triage and Emergency Assessment: As a All Users, I want to: >The solution to support multi-media, such as video, photos and audio so that >Examples of symptoms, diagnosis and treatment may be used throughout the consultation process

resource.name: The solution to sync data in an FHIR-compliant server
resource.description: *Business process* (G) Triage and Emergency Assessment: As a All Users, I want to: >The solution to sync data in an FHIR-compliant server so that >Ensure that data are stored and synced with a server, so that patient information relevant to another user of Child Health in Emergencies Digital Platform can access information for client history and to maintain continuity in care delivery

resource.name: To be able to add data and calculations as well as forms to the reference application, for localization (language support) and adaptation (addition of core health and data content), as well as calculations for decision-support and populating indicators
resource.description: *Business process* (G) Triage and Emergency Assessment: As a All Users, I want to: >To be able to add data and calculations as well as forms to the reference application, for localization (language support) and adaptation (addition of core health and data content), as well as calculations for decision-support and populating indicators so that >The tool and embedded forms (and associated interventions) can be adapted and localized by the user's governments/WHO/partners without requiring the assistance of engineers from the vendor each time

resource.name: To be able to agree/disagree with the diagnosis presented from the guidance and be able to select an alternative diagnosis stating the reasoning regarding the decision
resource.description: *Business process* (B) Assess and Classify the Sick Child: As a Health worker, I want to: >To be able to agree/disagree with the diagnosis presented from the guidance and be able to select an alternative diagnosis stating the reasoning regarding the decision so that >If a diagnosis is deemed incorrect that I can correct it with suitable reasoning to ensure that the correct treatment recommendations are provided

resource.name: To be able to agree/disagree with the diagnosis presented from the guidance and be able to select an alternative diagnosis stating the reasoning regarding the decision
resource.description: *Business process* (B) Assess and Classify the Sick Child: As a Health worker, I want to: >To be able to agree/disagree with the diagnosis presented from the guidance and be able to select an alternative diagnosis stating the reasoning regarding the decision so that >If a diagnosis is deemed incorrect that I can correct it with suitable reasoning to ensure that the correct treatment recommendations are provided

resource.name: To be able to choose the option of a consultation that leads me through the full process to assess and classify the sick child and further to treat the child, referral and follow-up
resource.description: *Business process* (B) Assess and Classify the Sick Child: As a Health worker, I want to: >To be able to choose the option of a consultation that leads me through the full process to assess and classify the sick child and further to treat the child, referral and follow-up so that >I can ensure that a complete consultation is provided

resource.name: To be able to choose the option to refer in general to the SMART guidance without having to complete a full consultation (e.g. for training/reference only)
resource.description: *Business process* (B) Assess and Classify the Sick Child: As a Health worker, I want to: >To be able to choose the option to refer in general to the SMART guidance without having to complete a full consultation (e.g. for training/reference only) so that >I can refresh my training and knowledge

resource.name: To be able to follow a consultation that focuses initially on the symptoms highlighted by the caregiver but that continues a full assessment of all possible symptoms
resource.description: *Business process* (B) Assess and Classify the Sick Child: As a Health worker, I want to: >To be able to follow a consultation that focuses initially on the symptoms highlighted by the caregiver but that continues a full assessment of all possible symptoms so that >I can provide a complete consultation and identify if there is more than one diagnosis and treatment recommendation

resource.name: To be able to follow a consultation that focuses initially on the symptoms highlighted by the caregiver but that continues a full assessment of all possible symptoms
resource.description: *Business process* (B) Assess and Classify the Sick Child: As a Health worker, I want to: >To be able to follow a consultation that focuses initially on the symptoms highlighted by the caregiver but that continues a full assessment of all possible symptoms so that >I can provide a complete consultation and identify if there is more than one diagnosis and treatment recommendation

resource.name: To be able to route the consultation via different health workers and save the information already entered to the consultation, even if the consultation is not yet complete, enabling other health workers to see the information already entered and to be able to add/edit information as it becomes available
resource.description: *Business process* (B) Assess and Classify the Sick Child: As a Health worker, I want to: >To be able to route the consultation via different health workers and save the information already entered to the consultation, even if the consultation is not yet complete, enabling other health workers to see the information already entered and to be able to add/edit information as it becomes available so that >I do not have to start a new consultation for every health worker that the client is involved with

resource.name: To be able to route the consultation via different health workers and save the information already entered to the consultation, even if the consultation is not yet complete, enabling other health workers to see the information already entered and to be able to add/edit information as it becomes available.
resource.description: *Business process* (B) Assess and Classify the Sick Child: As a Health worker, I want to: >To be able to route the consultation via different health workers and save the information already entered to the consultation, even if the consultation is not yet complete, enabling other health workers to see the information already entered and to be able to add/edit information as it becomes available. so that >I do not have to start a new consultation for every health worker that the client is involved with

resource.name: Use industry-standard user interface practices and apply them in a consistent manner throughout the system
resource.description:
*Category*: System requirements – usability
Use industry-standard user interface practices and apply them in a consistent manner throughout the system

resource.name: View a review of any past medical history previously entered
resource.description: *Business process* (B) Assess and Classify the Sick Child: As a Health worker, I want to: >View a review of any past medical history previously entered so that >I can provide appropriate services according to the latest clinical protocols

resource.name: Warn user if no valid back-up for more than a predefined number of days
resource.description:
*Category*: System requirements – general
Warn user if no valid back-up for more than a predefined number of days

resource.name: Work in an environment that is subject to loss of connectivity
resource.description:
*Category*: System requirements – general
Work in an environment that is subject to loss of connectivity
